mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two letters, S.W. Tiffey to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1869 June 7
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tiffey, S. W.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two letters dated the same day, June 7, 1869, from S.W. Tiffey, secretary, to Ann Pamela Cunningham. Both discuss general matters at Mount Vernon including repairs to the Mansion, plastering and wallpaper. One letter is written on the blank pages of another letter written from E.A. McIntire (Office of the Secretary of War) to Ann Pamela Cunningham requesting a visit by a group of Masons to Mount Vernon (this letter dated June 3, 1869)
